## Return Value

The URL of a shared document.

## Discussion

Override this method to provide the URL for the document with the given identifier. This method must be the inverse of [doc://com.apple.fileprovider/documentation/FileProvider/NSFileProviderExtension/persistentIdentifierForItem(at:)], mapping from the persistent identifier, back to the URL.

# urlForItem(withPersistentIdentifier:)

**Instance Method**

Returns the URL for a given persistent identifier.

## Declaration

```swift
func urlForItem(withPersistentIdentifier identifier: NSFileProviderItemIdentifier) -> URL?
```

## Parameters

- **identifier**: The persistent identifier for a shared document.

## Return Value

The URL of a shared document.

## Discussion

Override this method to provide the URL for the document with the given identifier. This method must be the inverse of [doc://com.apple.fileprovider/documentation/FileProvider/NSFileProviderExtension/persistentIdentifierForItem(at:)], mapping from the persistent identifier, back to the URL.

This URL must be inside the directory referred to by the [doc://com.apple.fileprovider/documentation/FileProvider/NSFileProviderManager] object’s [doc://com.apple.fileprovider/documentation/FileProvider/NSFileProviderManager/documentStorageURL] property.

## Working with items and persistent identifiers

- **persistentIdentifierForItem(at:)**: Returns a unique identifier for the given URL.
- **item(for:)**: Returns a description of the item associated with the persistent identifier.
- **enumerator(for:)**: Returns an enumerator for the specified item.
- **NSFileProviderItemIdentifier**: A unique identifier for an item managed by the File Provider extension.
